sentence.Network_en: They've been living and working peacefully with members of various ethnic groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们和不同民族的人们一起和睦地生活和工作。

sentence.Network_en: The US military expects the matter to be resolved peacefully.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国军方期待该事件得到和平解决。

sentence.Network_en: He died peacefully on 10th December after a short illness.
sentence.Network_cn: 病了一小段时间之后，他于12月10日安详辞世。

entry.def: If you say that someone died peacefully, you mean that they suffered no pain or violence when they died.

example.ex: He died peacefully on 10th December after a short illness.
example.tran: 病了一小段时间之后，他于12月10日安详辞世。

sentences.sentence: "the hen settled herself on the nest most peacefully"

auth_sentence.content: I've come into the mainstream to live peacefully.

sentences.en: He lives straight and peacefully with his neighbours.
sentences.cn: 他和他的邻居坦诚而和睦地住在一起。

sentences.en: Atheists and theists live together peacefully and amiably in this country.
sentences.cn: 无神论者和有神论者在该国和睦相处。
